sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import {Link, useParams} from "react-router-dom"; import Header from "./../components/Header"; import {PayPalButton} from "react-paypal-button-v2"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { getOrderDetails } from "../Redux/Actions/OrderActions"; import Loading from './../components/LoadingError/Loading'; import Message from './../components/LoadingError/Error'; import moment from 'moment'; import 'moment/locale/es'; import { payOrder } from '../Redux/Actions/OrderActions'; moment.locale('es'); const OrderScreen = () => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { id } = useParams(); const orderId = id; const orderDetails = useSelector((state) => state.orderDetails); const {order,loading,error} = orderDetails; const [showPaymentForm, setShowPaymentForm] = useState(false); if (!loading) { const addDecimals = (num) => { return (Math.round(num * 100) / 100).toFixed(2);}; order.itemsPrice = addDecimals(order.orderItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0)); } useEffect(() => { dispatch(getOrderDetails(orderId)); }, [dispatch, orderId]); const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Simula un resultado de pago const paymentResult = { id: Math.random().toString(36).substring(2), // Genera un ID de pago aleatorio status: 'COMPLETADO', update_time: new Date().toISOString(), email_address: "${order.user.email}" // Reemplaza esto con el correo electrónico del comprador }; order.isPaid = true; dispatch(payOrder(orderId, paymentResult)); }; return( <>
{ loading ? () : error ? ({error} ): ( <>
Cliente

{order.user.name}

{order.user.email}

{/* 2 */}
Información de orden

Envio: {order.shippingAddress.country}

Método de pago: {order.paymentMethod}

{ order.isPaid ? (

Pagado el {moment(order.paidAt).calendar()}

) : (

No pagado

) }
{/* 3 */}
Enviar a

Dirección: {order.shippingAddress.city}, {order.shippingAddress.address}, {order.shippingAddress.postalCode}

{ order.isDelivered ? (

Enviado el {moment(order.deliveredAt).calendar()}

) : (

No enviado

) }
{ order.orderItems.length === 0 ? ( Tu orden está vacia ) : ( <> { order.orderItems.map((item, index) => (
{item.name}

Cantidad

{item.qty}

Subtotal

${item.qty * item.price}
)) } ) }
{/*total*/}
Productos ${order.itemsPrice}
Envío ${order.shippingPrice}
Total ${order.totalPrice}
{showPaymentForm && (
)}
) }
); }; export default OrderScreen; // /*
*/
